titleStmt.title: Letters from Paris, received the 15. of Jan. 1648. Directed to severall committees and Members of Parliament. / Printed by speciall order, and for full satisfaction to all nations, concerning their late transactions. 15. Jan. 1648. ; Imprimatur Gilb: Mabbott.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons, in Aldersgate-Street,

notesStmt.note: The letters are dated 9 Jan/30 Dec. 1648/9, 13 Jan. 1648[/9], and 16/6 Jan. 1649/8.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
